projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our influencer and media projects realized worldwide.

bahrain.title: Bahrain
bahrain.description: Bahreyn'in zengin kültürel mirasını ve modern yaşamını dünyaya tanıtan etkileyici bir medya projesi.

report.title: Bahrain Destinasyon PR Kampanyası
report.description: Bahreyn Turizm Otoritesi ile gerçekleştirdiğimiz bu kapsamlı PR kampanyasında, destinasyonun zengin kültürel mirasını ve modern yaşam tarzını dünyaya tanıttık. 15 influencer ile yapılan iş birliği sonucunda 25M+ organik erişim elde ettik. Proje süresince yerel kültür, gastronomi ve turizm deneyimlerini öne çıkaran içerikler ürettik.

sharm.title: Sharm El Sheikh
sharm.description: Mısır'ın incisi Sharm El Sheikh'in turkuaz suları ve renkli mercan resifleriyle unutulmaz anlar.

report.title: Sharm El Sheikh Underwater Experience - Project 1
report.description: In our project at Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt's touristic pearl, we highlighted the unique underwater beauties of the Red Sea and luxury vacation opportunities. We reached 18M+ with 10 content creators.

press.title: Turkish Content Creators in Sharm El Sheikh
press.description: Turkish influencers showcased the beauties of the Red Sea in Join PR's organized Sharm El Sheikh campaign.

press.title: Egyptian Tourism in Digital Media
press.description: Sharm El Sheikh underwater experience campaign reached 18 million people on social media.

press.title: New Trend in Influencer Marketing
press.description: Influencer collaborations are now one of the most effective tools in the tourism sector for destination promotion.

report.title: Sharm El Sheikh Luxury Holiday Experience - Project 2
report.description: With our luxury vacation campaign at Sharm El Sheikh's 5-star hotels and premium beaches, we showcased the destination's comfort and entertainment opportunities. We reached 12M+ with 8 influencers.

press.title: Luxury Tourism Campaign in Egypt
press.description: Sharm El Sheikh's 5-star hotels were promoted with Turkish influencers, reaching 12 million people.

press.title: Premium Holiday Experience on Social Media
press.description: Wellness and spa experiences were highlighted in Join PR's organized luxury vacation campaign.

press.title: Influencer Tourism Collaborations
press.description: Luxury hotel chains are discovering ways to reach their target audience with influencer marketing.

report.title: Sharm El Sheikh Wellness & Spa - Project 3
report.description: In this project highlighting the destination's wellness tourism potential, we covered spa, yoga and meditation experiences. We reached 10M+ with 7 wellness influencers.

press.title: Wellness Tourism in Sharm El Sheikh
press.description: Yoga and meditation-focused wellness campaign reached 10 million people.

press.title: Wellness Trend in the Digital Age
press.description: Collaborations with wellness influencers support the healthy living trend.

press.title: Wellness Tourism Takes Off in Egypt
press.description: Sharm El Sheikh spa and wellness centers are standing out with influencer marketing.

report.title: Sharm El Sheikh Water Sports - Project 4
report.description: In our campaign featuring adrenaline-filled activities such as kitesurfing, jet ski and parasailing, we showcased Sharm El Sheikh's water sports paradise. We reached 14M+ with 9 adventure influencers.

press.title: Adrenaline-Filled Water Sports Campaign
press.description: Kitesurf and jet ski activities reached 14 million people on social media.

press.title: Adventure Tourism Goes Digital
press.description: Campaigns with water sports influencers appeal to the young generation.

press.title: Adrenaline in the Red Sea
press.description: Sharm El Sheikh stands out as a water sports center, promoted with influencer collaborations.

report.title: Sharm El Sheikh Gastronomy Discovery - Project 5
report.description: With a gastronomy tour covering Egyptian cuisine and international restaurants, we highlighted Sharm El Sheikh's culinary culture. We reached 11M+ with 6 food bloggers.

press.title: Egyptian Cuisine on Social Media
press.description: Sharm El Sheikh's culinary destination was promoted with food bloggers, reaching 11 million people.

press.title: Gastronomy Tourism on the Rise
press.description: Collaborations with food influencers are opening a new dimension in destination promotion.

press.title: Flavor Discovery in the Digital Age
press.description: Viral gastronomy content on Instagram and TikTok is fueling the tourism sector.

hurghada.title: Hurghada
hurghada.description: An adventure discovering the unique beauty of the Red Sea and a water sports paradise.

report.title: Hurghada Adventure & Water Sports - Project 1
report.description: In our campaign highlighting Hurghada's dynamic water sports and adventure tourism potential, we combined adrenaline-filled activities with luxury vacation experiences. Collaboration with 12 influencers reached 20M+ people.

report.title: Hurghada Coral Reefs Discovery - Project 2
report.description: In this project featuring the Red Sea's colorful coral reefs and marine life, we highlighted diving and snorkeling experiences. We reached 16M+ with 10 influencers.

report.title: Hurghada Desert Safari Experience - Project 3
report.description: In this campaign showcasing Hurghada's desert tours, quad safari and Bedouin culture, we revealed a different side of the destination. We reached 13M+ with 8 adventure influencers.

report.title: Hurghada Luxury Resort Experience - Project 4
report.description: Luxury vacation campaign showcasing Hurghada's 5-star resort hotels, spas and premium beaches. We reached 12M+ with 7 luxury influencers.

morocco.title: Morocco
morocco.description: A cultural journey experiencing Morocco's magical cities, desert and rich cuisine.

report.title: Morocco Culture & Gastronomy Discovery
report.description: In this project covering Morocco's magical cities, rich culinary culture and desert landscapes, we presented the destination's authentic beauties to the world. The campaign with 8 influencers reached 15M+. We highlighted Morocco's tourism potential through Marrakech, Fes and Sahara Desert experiences.

jordan.title: Jordan
jordan.description: Jordan's treasures from the ancient beauty of Petra to the desert landscapes of Wadi Rum.

report.title: Jordan History & Nature Journey
report.description: In this project featuring the ancient beauty of Petra and the mesmerizing desert landscapes of Wadi Rum, we highlighted Jordan's historical and natural wealth. The campaign with 11 influencers reached 22M+. We showcased the destination's diversity through the Dead Sea, Petra and desert camps.

montenegro.title: Montenegro
montenegro.description: The magnificent bays and mountain views of Montenegro, the hidden paradise of the Adriatic.

report.title: Montenegro Adriatic Coast Discovery
report.description: In this project showcasing the magnificent bays, mountain views and historic towns of Montenegro, the hidden paradise of the Adriatic, we shared the destination's unique beauties. Our work with 9 influencers reached 16M+. We discovered Montenegro through the views of Kotor, Budva and Durmitor.

cases.title: In the Press
cases.description: We work to increase brand value by highlighting our clients' success stories in the press. We provide reliable, effective, innovative communication solutions.

cards.title: Turkish Actors in Egypt
cards.description: Turkish actors, fascinated by Egypt's historical, touristic and cultural structure and the Red Sea, invited everyone to experience this.

cards.title: Turkish Actors' Bahrain Landing
cards.description: Famous Turkish actors participated in a series of events lasting three days in Bahrain.

cards.title: Prontotour celebrated its 30th anniversary in Marrakech.
cards.description: Prontotour, a tour operator that sets trends in the travel industry, started its 30th anniversary celebrations in Morocco. Famous actors had the opportunity to explore Marrakech.

cards.title: Prontotour Erken Rezervasyonun İlk Dönemini %70 Artışla Tamamladı
cards.description: Erken rezervasyonun ilk dönemini yüzde 70 artışla tamamlayan ve ikinci dönemi başlatan Prontotour, yurt içinde yüzde 50, yurt dışında yüzde 40 indirim fırsatları sunuyor.

cards.title: Leaders CXO 14. Buluşma Toplantısı
cards.description: Leaderscxo Kurucu Başkanı Cenk Dağcı ve Join Pr kurucusu Ali Saçlı ev sahipliğinde sınırlı sayıda katılımcı ve özel davet ile gerçekleştirilen 2022 yılının ilk buluşmasının konukları; Prof. Dr. İlber Ortaylı, Prof. Dr. Uğur Batı...

cards.title: Prontotour, Ünlü Oyuncu ve Influencer’lara Yönelik Bir Dünya Turu Programı Başlatıyor
cards.description: Tur şirketi Prontotour, Türkiye’den ünlü oyuncu ve influencer’lara yönelik bir yıl sürecek bir dünya turu programı hazırladığını duyurdu.

cards.title: Türk Oyuncular Kızıldeniz’de Tatil Keyfi Yaptı
cards.description: Türk dizi ve film oyuncuları Kızıldeniz kıyısında tatil kenti Hurghada’da tatil keyfi yaptı. Baran Bölükbaşı, Pelin Uluksar, Gizem Güneş, Damlasu İkizoğlu, Ahmet Kayakesen, Oral Özer ve Berna Koraltürk Mısır’ın Hurghada kentini ziyaret etti.

cards.title: Mısır’da Çöl Safarisi
cards.description: Türk oyuncular Ayça Ayşin Turan, Salih Bademci, İmer Özgün, Erkan Kolçak Köstendil, Cansu Tosun, İlayda Ildır, İpek Filiz Yazıcı ve Alican Okumuş, Mısır’da bulunan Şarm El Şeyh kentini ziyaret etti.

cards.title: Türk Oyuncular Mısır’ın en ünlü tatil merkezinde buluştu
cards.description: Türkiye’nin önde gelen başarılı oyuncuları, ‘Mısır’ın İncisi’ Sina Yarımadası’nda bulunan Şarm El Şeyh’te dört gün süren bir etkinliğe katıldı. Şarm El Şeyh’in tarihi, kültürel yapısı ve Kızıldenizi’ne hayran kaldıklarını belirtti.

cards.title: Türk Oyuncular Ürdün’e Hayran Kaldı
cards.description: Ünlü dizi oyuncuları Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş ve Emin Günenç Ürdün’de ağırlandı. Ülkenin turistik ve kültürel yapısına hayran kalan Türk oyuncular, rol aldıkları dizi ve sinema projelerinin Ürdün’de beğeni görmesi ve davet edilmelerinden duydukları memnuniyeti dile getirdi.

cards.title: Türk Oyuncular Karadağ’a Çıkarma Yaptı
cards.description: Join PR organizasyonu ile Regent Porto Montenegro Hotel, Air Montenegro Havayolları, Tivat Turizm Tanıtma Ofisi ve Porto Montenegro ev sahipliğinde gerçekleşen davete ünlü oyuncular Ali Yağcı, Mehmet Aykaç, Gökçe Akyıldız, Dilara Aksüyek, Emin Günenç ve Join PR kurucusu Ali Saçlı katıldı.

cards.title: Ürdün Destinasyon Tanıtımı
cards.description: Ünlü dizi oyuncuları Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş ve Emin Günenç Ürdün’de ağırlandı. Ülkenin turistik ve kültürel yapısına hayran kalan Türk oyuncular, rol aldıkları dizi ve sinema projelerinin Ürdün’de beğeni görmesi ve davet edilmelerinden duydukları memnuniyeti dile getirdi.

cards.title: Prontotour’un 2024 Erken Rezervasyon Dönemi Başladı
cards.description: Yazseverler, 2024 için tatil planlarını şimdiden yapmaya başladı. Türkiye’nin önde gelen tur operatörü markalarından Prontotour ise tatilciler için yurt dışı, yurt içi ve gemi turlarında ‘Uçak bileti fiyatına tur!’

clients.title: Birlikte büyüdüğümüz markalar
clients.description: Küresel destinasyonlar, yaşam tarzı ikonları, iddialı girişimler ve köklü markalar Join ile entegre iletişim için çalışıyor.

about.title: WHO ARE WE?
about.subtitle: Join PR is a next-generation communication agency that doesn't just manage communication, but transforms brands' stories into experiences.
about.description: With its focus on hospitality, aviation, tourism promotion offices and lifestyle brands, it brings together expertise in the tourism sector and global experience. With its 360° communication model based on strategy, creativity and data, it manages not the visibility of brands, but their perception.

media.title: Turning Experience into Strategy!

Discover the short video about how the Join PR ecosystem creates measurable impact for brands.

Success in tourism comes from a well-crafted story. Join PR creates communication strategies that enable brands to establish emotional connections with their target audience.

shorts.description: We embrace the vertical format that the digital world has adopted, producing effective vertical video content designed in the most screen-appropriate format for brands. From production to creativity, from editing to broadcasting, we offer innovative solutions that master the dynamics of the vertical world throughout all processes.

videoPortfolio.description: We transform brands' stories into compelling visual experiences through our wide range of creative production work, from destination promotions to hotel advertising films, from fashion and lifestyle productions to restaurant concept videos.

about.title: Join Creative – Creative Strategy, Production and Content Ecosystem
about.description:
Join Creative is a creative production and content studio that transforms brands' stories into a modern, striking, and compelling visual language. We offer high-standard creative solutions to brands across a wide range, from commercial films to social media content, from fashion & lifestyle productions to hotel and destination promotions.

Our creative team creates a holistic experience that increases brands' communication power by managing end-to-end processes including concept development, scriptwriting, art direction, photography & video production, post-production, and digital content design.

cta.title: Live your next creative production experience with Join x Creative.
cta.description: Tell us about your project, let's prepare a custom production plan for you.

seo.title: Join Social | Social Media Strategy and Community Management
seo.description: Join Social offers social strategy, content calendar, community management and optimization.

hero.title: Social Media Management and Strategy
hero.subtitle: Join Social provides strategic social media management that strengthens brands' identity in the digital world.
hero.description: We build continuous social programs that integrate content, creators, media and data insight.

strategy.title: Content planning & publishing calendar
strategy.description: Publishing calendars shaped by campaigns, platform-based content queues and approval processes.

planning.title: Trend-aligned short video and visual production
planning.description: Storyboard, shooting and post-production workflows for Reels, TikTok and short formats.

community.title: Community engagement and moderation
community.description: Creative community activations with DM, comment and UGC moderation.

reporting.title: Monthly reporting & content performance analysis
reporting.description: Monthly dashboards, content-based KPI reports and optimization recommendations.

steps.title: Analysis
steps.description: We listen to you, clearly identify your brand's needs, and lay the foundation for your roadmap.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Based on identified needs, we create your social media strategy, establish channel architecture, and prepare the measurement framework.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: We prepare a custom dashboard where you can monitor and manage all your social media channels from one place. Then we activate content and publishing processes.

steps.title: Optimization
steps.description: We operate a continuous improvement cycle with performance insights, test plans, and innovation sprints, advancing results every quarter.

cta.title: Ready for next-generation social media management?

media.title: Manage Your Brand's Entire Digital World from One Center with Join Social
media.description: Join Social, which strengthens your social media strategy with artificial intelligence, automates and professionalizes the entire process from content production to trend tracking, from visual communication language to reporting. It allows you to manage all your platforms from a single smart panel without password sharing and without security vulnerabilities.
items: Post performance, trend content, competitor analysis and growth forecasts
Consistent visual and textual communication language

seo.title: Join Ads | Performance Marketing and Digital Advertising
seo.description: Join Ads offers media planning, campaign optimization and performance measurement.

hero.title: Digital Advertising Management & Performance Marketing
hero.subtitle: Integrated media strategies on Google, Meta and emerging platforms.
hero.description: We build measurable programs tailored to your acquisition, conversion and loyalty goals.

about.title: Join Ads – Digital Advertising Management and Performance Marketing
about.description:
Join Ads is a performance-focused advertising management subsidiary that designs integrated media strategies on Google, Meta, TikTok, YouTube, and programmatic platforms to accelerate brands' digital growth. With our data-driven approach, we build scalable campaign models tailored to your acquisition, conversion, and loyalty goals.

We achieve sustainable results in search, display, video, discovery, and social media campaigns through advanced algorithms, proper audience architecture, and creative variation tests; managing brands' advertising investments with maximum efficiency.

services.title: Google Ads Management
services.description: Algorithm-focused optimization and continuous performance improvement in search, display, video and discovery campaigns.

services.title: Meta Ads Management
services.description: Scalable results in the Meta ecosystem with creative variation tests, right audience architecture and conversion-focused campaign setups.

services.title: Other Platforms
services.description: Multi-channel growth strategies in YouTube, TikTok, programmatic and target-specific media partnerships.

services.title: Performance Reporting and Optimization
services.description: Agile decision-making processes and sustainable performance improvement with advanced dashboards, attribution models and continuous experiments.

metrics.title: Three Optimization Areas That Shape Growth

items.title: Cost Per Acquisition (CPA)
items.description: We sustainably reduce acquisition costs with data-driven optimization, creative variation tests and AI-powered targeting.

items.title: Conversion Rate
items.description: By aligning the user journey with media strategy, we accelerate the conversion flow from first touch to purchase.

items.title: Lifetime Value (LTV)
items.description: We increase customer value in the long term with audience insight-based segmentation, retargeting and upselling touches.

cta.title: Plan your next campaign with Join x Ads.
cta.description: Let's strengthen your digital advertising strategy, create measurable results to reach your growth goals.

seo.title: Join AI Lab | Web Development and AI Solutions
seo.description: Join AI Lab develops corporate websites, e-commerce automations, AI agents and data integrations.

hero.title: Design, code and artificial intelligence
hero.subtitle: We design future-ready experiences from corporate platforms to AI automations.
hero.description: We design, develop and continuously improve web ecosystems powered by automation and artificial intelligence together with brands.

about.title: Join AI Lab – AI-Powered Web, Mobile and Automation Solutions
about.description:
Join AI Lab is an innovative technology subsidiary that brings together artificial intelligence, modern software technologies, and automation platforms to accelerate brands' digital transformation. We offer end-to-end solutions in web development, UI/UX design, mobile application development, AI agents, chatbots, data integrations, and workflow automations.

From corporate companies to e-commerce brands, from travel agencies to the insurance sector, we design, develop, and continuously improve high-performance websites, user-friendly mobile experiences, and LLM-based automation systems across a wide spectrum.

We accelerate businesses' processes and prepare their digital operations for the future with holistic solutions such as modern technology stack, LLM/API integrations, n8n automations, data products, CRM integrations, AI-powered content management, secure infrastructure, and scalable system design.

services.title: Web Development UI/UX Design and optimization
services.description: Performance and scalability focused corporate and dynamic websites.

services.title: E-commerce automations
services.description: Solutions that automate workflows, product management and customer journey.

services.title: AI agents and chatbots
services.description: Customized agent frameworks and integrated chat experiences.

services.title: Data automations and integrations
services.description: ETL pipelines, dashboards and data products that enable cross-team data flow.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We clarify business goals, user scenarios and areas where artificial intelligence will add real value together.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: We design end-to-end web/mobile experience, user flows and AI interactions (chatbots, agents, recommendation systems, etc.).

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We code the application with modern technology stack, safely implement LLM/API integrations and data layer.

steps.title: Automation & Integration
steps.description: We set up intelligent workflows working in the background with CRM, payment systems, third-party services and automation platforms (n8n, etc.).

steps.title: Optimization
steps.description: We regularly improve models, flows and interface by tracking usage data; continuously develop the system by adding new AI scenarios.

mobile.title: Mobile Application Experiences
mobile.description: We bring your mobile applications to life with user-centric design and advanced technology. We offer performant, secure and user-friendly solutions on iOS and Android platforms.

cta.title: Let's build your new digital product together.
cta.description: Talk about your brief, let's design your web or AI solution together.

about.title: Join Escapes
about.description:
Join Escapes is a strategic subsidiary that expands Join PR's expertise in tourism, destination communication, and global travel experiences. It promotes destinations, hotels, and gastronomic experiences around the world through a modern editorial approach and strong visual storytelling.

Through influencer collaborations, celebrity activations, video productions, and content-focused campaigns, it aims to increase destination awareness, strengthen travel motivation, and elevate brands' global visibility.

Join Escapes specializes in travel journalism, creative content production, destination PR, brand experiences, and concept campaigns tailored for tourism brands, offering holistic communication support to the industry.

In short:

Join PR's strategic communication power combines with Join Escapes' discovery vision — creating an impressive travel communication ecosystem for brands.
